ValidationRule.description: The user can not accept the case if it is owned by another user (not a queue)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED( OwnerId ) , RecordType.Name = 'Customer Service Case', NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Owner_role__c))) , OwnerId = $User.Id )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The case is already assigned to another user
